name: Poké Ball
text: Flip a coin. If heads, you may search your deck for any Basic Pokémon or Evolution card. Show that card to your opponent, then put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

effect.text: Flip a coin. If heads, you may search your deck for any Basic Pokémon or Evolution card. Show that card to your opponent, then put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

strengths: No energy cost - it's a Trainer

competitiveHistory: Poké Ball from Jungle was a budget alternative to Computer Search for Pokemon searching. While the coin-flip requirement made it unreliable, it was still useful for decks that needed to find specific Pokemon and couldn't afford 4 Computer Search. It was often run alongside Computer Search and Pokemon Trader to increase search consistency.

rulings.ruling: If you flip tails, the attack fails and you do not search your deck.
You must show the Pokemon you find to your opponent before putting it in your hand.
You can search for either a Basic Pokemon or an Evolution card, but not a Trainer or Energy.
You must shuffle your deck after using Poké Ball, even if you flip tails.
